Name: Stela
Description: This stela is now lost but is included in the database because the information may have implications for research. The details are taken from original accession cards.This rectangular limestone stela belonged to Neferher. It is divided into two registers, in the upper register are two kneeling figures with a htp-dj-nsw formula above. The lower register depicts three kneeling figures, facing right, with their names inscribed by their heads (reading right to left, see 'Hieroglyphs'). The back of the stela has been smoothed.
